Create: create table if not exists OmOption (Name text not null,Category text not null)
create index if not exists "OmOption_Category" on "OmOption"("Category")
OmOption.Data: select a.Name,b.Name Category from cm_option a, cm_option_group b where a.GroupID=b.ID order by Category,Dispidx

Create: create table if not exists OmReport (ID integer not null,Name text,Define text,primary key (ID))
create table if not exists OmMenu (ID integer not null,ParentID integer,Name text,IsGroup integer,ViewName text,Params text,Icon text,Note text,DispIdx integer,primary key (ID))
create index if not exists "OmMenu_DispIdx" on "OmMenu"("DispIdx")
OmMenu.Data: select * from cm_menu where islocked=0 order by dispidx
